Summary: Sighted UFO Hanging Stationary South of Clinton
divs: sighting detailswent outside for a cig. on the back patio \ crystal clear blue sky and no clouds or stars or moon in sight ..... and in looking up and around in the sky i sighted what appeared to be, i'd find out later in looking into it, a classic orange glowing orb. it appeared totally out of place in both size, color, placement, brightness....it appeared much larger than the passing jet that my wife and i got to see pass in front of it ....that is between us and the object. it hung about 45 degrees looking south from clinton, ms for about 10 minutes by which time my wife had grown bored with it....and in a blink....it was gone from sight. just gone. see attached ... it looked exactly as shown. w
